PageInfo.Message:
At night or inside caves, visibility becomes poor
and dark.
<COL ffdc78>Use a lantern</COL> in the darkness.
【<KC UI_GAME_MENU>】In the game menu, go to <COL
ffdc78>Item Bag</COL> and use the consumable item
<COL ffdc78>Lantern Kindling</COL> to illuminate
the player's surroundings for a certain period of
time.
Always carry several <COL ffdc78>Lantern
Kindling</COL> with you.
